description: T.1 Beech - Remove secondary co-dominant stem with included union, crown lift to 3.5m from ground level, crown thin by 25% & deadwood.T.2 Beech - Laterally reduce to provide 3m clearance from building & street lamp shaping into remaining canopy sympathetically with all cuts made to suitable growth points, crown lift to 3.5m from ground level, crown thin by 25% & deadwood.

decision_conditions: T.1 Beech - Remove secondary co-dominant stem with included union, crown lift to 3.5m from ground level, crown thin by 10% & deadwood.T.2 Beech - 2m Lateral reduction of secondary and tertiary growth to suitable growth points providing clearance from building & street lamp, crown lift to 3.5m from ground level, crown thin by 10% & deadwood.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
